short_summary: This call is for data literacy training services for Statistics Canada federal government department employees. The contract will be a standing offer contract for one year with four optional one-year extensions.
description: The solicitation is for data literacy training services, and the objectives of the program of work are: 1) to assess data literacy levels among public servant employees in federal government departments and agencies, 2) to identify data literacy training needs based on the results of the assessment, 3) to obtain consultation services to support federal departments and agencies to develop a data literacy training plan, and 4) to provide data literacy training to federal government departments and agencies.
full_summary:
Statistics Canada: Request for Standing Offer for Data Literacy Assessment Services and Training Plan
=============================================

**Reference Number**: J064767
**Organization**: Statistics Canada

### Opportunity Summary

Statistics Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a request for standing offer for data literacy assessment services and training plan. The goods or services to be procured are categorized under the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS), 54199.

### Description of Work

Data literacy is the ability to understand information extracted from data and summarized in simple statistics, and to use them to inform decisions. The objectives of this project are to assess data literacy levels among Statistics Canada employees and other federal government departments, identify data literacy training needs, and obtain consultation services to support the development of a data literacy training plan.

### Provisions and Instructions

* **Estimated Delivery Date**: 2024-03-31
* **Contract Duration**: One (1) year with an option to extend for up to four (4) additional one-year periods
* **Language of Procurement**: English and French
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Evaluation Criteria

This procurement will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit and overall quality of the proposal
* Capacity and experience of the supplier
* Competitiveness of the proposal

### Submission Instructions

To submit a response to this solicitation, please refer to the solicitation document, which is available for download at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

For more information, please contact: Susan Hall, Contracting Authority
                                susan.hall@statcan.gc.ca
                                613-882-2470

### Submission Deadline

The closing date for submission is March 3, 2023, at 02:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST). ****

By Order of the Government of Canada.  ****

**Note**

This solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers. Suppliers are required to meet the solicitation requirements and submit their proposal electronically through the CCN Procurement Portal or in writing to the Authority at the address below.
